data.title: How to Find Us
meta_keywords: how to get to the National Space Centre
data.meta_description: Discover how to find your way to The National Space Centre with ease. Find directions, transportation options, and parking information. Plan your visit now.
data.text:
Car Parking

The National Space Centre has over 400 onsite parking spaces, including a coach park and accessible spaces. Please note that on special/premium events and February/October half term periods all three car parks can fill VERY quickly.

All vehicles are parked at the owners risk and the National Space Centre takes no responsibility for any damage to vehicles made by other car park users.

Parking fees are in place 09:00-17:00.

The charge covers the upkeep of the facility, meaning that the charity money can be used to ensure the curation of the artefact collection and our focus on education for schools, families, children and adults.

It also means that those not using the car park do not pay for the facility.

Coaches – Pre-booked visit (on our schedule) – FOC

Coaches – Not pre-booked visit - £10 (cannot be offered on peak periods)

Coaches – Parking only , no visitors - £15 (cannot be offered on peak periods)

Please note, we do not offer overnight parking. This includes mobile homes and caravans.
